page.title: 15Library Service 04400144
page.content: The{Andover mobile library}provides the full range of Hampshire Library Services to Lparish.The van comes fortnightly (Friday afternoons)and stops at The Plough(04420144),The Cricketers(04430144)and The Woodwalk (04430144)for about 30 mins. As the Mobile Library{calls during the {day-time}most users are{married women} or{retired people.}One person can borrow books for everyone in the family.At the time of writing 44 family tickets were in current use and at the call prior to May 10th , {157 novels,34 non-fiction, { 46 children's books were borrowed. A mobile library comes to H.Priors from Southam near Basingstoke.It stops at the Old School 10-00 -10-20 and Apsley Cottages 10-30-10-50 on Wednesday once a fortnight.
